com.netflix.spectator.sandbox

Class HttpLogEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.sandbox.HttpLogEntry

  • public class HttpLogEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for logging http request related information.

      • withOriginalUri

        public HttpLogEntry withOriginalUri(java.lang.String uri)
        Set the original uri. In the case of approaches with client-side load balancing this will be some alias indicating the group of hosts. The request uri would indicate a specific host used for an actual network request.

      • withOriginalUri

        public HttpLogEntry withOriginalUri(java.net.URI uri)
        Set the original uri. In the case of approaches with client-side load balancing this will be some alias indicating the group of hosts. The request uri would indicate a specific host used for an actual network request.

        Set the content-length for the request.

      • withRemoteAddr

        public HttpLogEntry withRemoteAddr(java.lang.String addr)
        Set the remote address. For a client making a request this should be the server, for a server receiving a request it should be the client.

      • withRemotePort

        public HttpLogEntry withRemotePort(int port)
        Set the remote port. For a client making a request this should be the server, for a server receiving a request it should be the client.

      • withAttempt

        public HttpLogEntry withAttempt(int n)
        Set the attempt if retries are used, should only be used after the initial request.
